title: Maroon 5 Announce New Album Love Is Like, 2025 Tour Dates
description: The Grammy-winning band also released a new single titled "All Night." Maroon 5 Announce New Album Love Is Like, 2025 Tour Dates Eddie Fu
author: Eddie Fu
excerpt: Maroon 5 have announced their new album, Love Is Like, and a supporting 2025 US arena tour kicking off this fall. Plus, hear new single "All Night."
text: Maroon 5 have announced their new album, Love Is Like, and a supporting 2025 US arena tour to go with it. The project will be released on August 15th via Interscope and features the new single “All Night.” Stream it below. In a statement, lead vocalist Adam Levine described the album as Maroon 5 going back to basics. “I feel like we’ve gone back to what we used to do, which is to not pay attention to where we fit and producing the music organically,” he said. “This is kind of how we stuck out in the beginning when we first started our career.” Get Maroon 5 Tickets Here The Grammy-winning band’s 23-date tour in support of Love Is Like kicks off on October 6th in Phoenix and also features stops in cities including Los Angeles, Nashville, Austin, Chicago, and New York. Claire Rosinkranz will support on all dates. See the full schedule below. Tickets for Maroon 5’s US tour go on sale to the general public on Friday, June 27th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. There will be multiple pre-sales, including a fan club pre-sale (sign up here) on Wednesday, June 25th, and a Live Nation pre-sale for select dates (use code TREBLE) on Thursday, June 26th, both beginning at 10:00 a.m. local time. Love Is Like marks the follow-up to 2021’s Jordi. The upcoming release also features Maroon 5’s recent single “Priceless,” featuring BLACKPINK’s Lisa. html:
Maroon 5 have announced their new album, Love Is Like, and a supporting 2025 US arena tour to go with it. The project will be released on August 15th via Interscope and features the new single “All Night.” Stream it below.

In a statement, lead vocalist Adam Levine described the album as Maroon 5 going back to basics. “I feel like we’ve gone back to what we used to do, which is to not pay attention to where we fit and producing the music organically,” he said. “This is kind of how we stuck out in the beginning when we first started our career.”

Get Maroon 5 Tickets Here

The Grammy-winning band’s 23-date tour in support of Love Is Like kicks off on October 6th in Phoenix and also features stops in cities including Los Angeles, Nashville, Austin, Chicago, and New York. Claire Rosinkranz will support on all dates. See the full schedule below.

Tickets for Maroon 5’s US tour go on sale to the general public on Friday, June 27th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. There will be multiple pre-sales, including a fan club pre-sale (sign up here) on Wednesday, June 25th, and a Live Nation pre-sale for select dates (use code TREBLE) on Thursday, June 26th, both beginning at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Love Is Like marks the follow-up to 2021’s Jordi. The upcoming release also features Maroon 5’s recent single “Priceless,” featuring BLACKPINK’s Lisa.
